I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

orig_msg_serializer: Serializer msg

Goal:
forall net : ordered_dynamic_network, pt_map_odnet net = deserialize_odnet net

Record ordered_dynamic_network (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkODNetwork { odnwNodes : list name; odnwPackets : name -> name -> list msg; odnwState : name -> option data } Arguments ordered_dynamic_network {P multi_params} Arguments mkODNetwork {P multi_params} _%list_scope (_ _)%function_scope
Record FailMsgParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailMsgParams { msg_fail : msg } Arguments FailMsgParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailMsgParams [P0]
Record NameOverlayParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_NameOverlayParams { adjacent_to : Relation_Definitions.relation name; adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y}; adjacent_to_symmetric : RelationClasses.Symmetric adjacent_to; adjacent_to_irreflexive : RelationClasses.Irreflexive adjacent_to } Arguments NameOverlayParams {P0} Arguments Build_NameOverlayParams [P0] _ [adjacent_to] _%function_scope

Record Serializer (A : Type) : Type := Build_Serializer { serialize : A -> IOStreamWriter.t; deserialize : ByteListReader.t A; serialize_deserialize_id : serialize_deserialize_id_spec serialize deserialize } Arguments Serializer _%type_scope Arguments Build_Serializer [A]%type_scope _%function_scope [deserialize] _%function_scope

step_ordered_dynamic_star = fun (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (overlay_params : NameOverlayParams multi_params) (new_msg_params : NewMsgParams multi_params) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_ordered_dynamic : forall (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P), NameOverlayParams multi_params -> NewMsgParams multi_params -> step_relation ordered_dynamic_network (name * (input + output)) Arguments step_ordered_dynamic_star {P multi_params overlay_params new_msg_params}
pt_map_onet_deserialize_onet : forall net : ordered_network, pt_map_onet net = deserialize_onet net
pt_map_net_deserialize_net : forall net : network, pt_map_net net = deserialize_net net
serialize_name_msg_tuple = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params) (orig_msg_serializer : Serializer msg) (nm : name * msg) => let (n, msg0) := nm in (n, serialize_top (serialize msg0)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params), Serializer msg -> name * msg -> name * IOStreamWriter.wire Arguments serialize_name_msg_tuple {orig_base_params orig_multi_params orig_msg_serializer}
serialized_input_handlers = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params) (orig_msg_serializer : Serializer msg) (h : name) (inp : input) (d : data) => serialize_handler_result (input_handlers h inp d) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params), Serializer msg -> name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * IOStreamWriter.wire) Arguments serialized_input_handlers {orig_base_params orig_multi_params orig_msg_serializer}
serialize_handler_result = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params) (orig_msg_serializer : Serializer msg) '(outputs, data0, messages) => (outputs, data0, map serialize_name_msg_tuple messages) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params), Serializer msg -> list output * data * list (name * msg) -> list output * data * list (name * IOStreamWriter.wire) Arguments serialize_handler_result {orig_base_params orig_multi_params orig_msg_serializer}
serialized_multi_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params) (orig_msg_serializer : Serializer msg) => {| name := name; msg := IOStreamWriter.wire; msg_eq_dec := IOStreamWriter.wire_eq_dec; name_eq_dec := name_eq_dec; nodes := nodes; all_names_nodes := all_names_nodes; no_dup_nodes := no_dup_nodes; init_handlers := init_handlers; net_handlers := serialized_net_handlers; input_handlers := serialized_input_handlers |} : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params), Serializer msg -> MultiParams serialized_base_params Arguments serialized_multi_params {orig_base_params orig_multi_params orig_msg_serializer}
step_failure_tot_mapped_simulation_2 : (forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' -> o = o') -> forall (fail_fst : FailureParams orig_multi_params) (fail_snd : FailureParams serialized_multi_params), FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency fail_fst fail_snd orig_base_params_tot_map -> forall (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list name) (out : list (name * (input + list output))) (mnet : network) (mfailed mfailed' : list name) (mout : list (name * (input + list output))), step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> tot_map_net mnet = net -> map tot_map_name mfailed = failed ->...-> exists mnet' : network, step_failure (mfailed, mnet) (mfailed', mnet') mout /\ tot_map_net mnet' = net'
Inductive step_ordered_dynamic (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (overlay_params : NameOverlayParams multi_params) (new_msg_params : NewMsgParams multi_params) : step_relation ordered_dynamic_network (name * (input + output)) := StepOrderedDynamic_start : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> step_ordered_dynamic net net' [] |...
serialized_net_handlers = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params) (orig_msg_serializer : Serializer msg) (dst src : name) (wm : IOStreamWriter.wire) (d : data) => match deserialize_top deserialize wm with | Some m => serialize_handler_result (net_handlers dst src m d) | None => ([], d, []) end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (orig_multi_params : MultiParams orig_base_params), Serializer msg -> name -> name -> IOStreamWriter.wire -> data -> list output * data * list (name * IOStreamWriter.wire) Arguments serialized_net_handlers {orig_base_params orig_multi_params orig_msg_serializer}
StepFailure_drop : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := xs ++ ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') []

```coq
intros net.
unfold pt_map_odnet, deserialize_odnet.
f_equal.
- apply functional_extensionality.
  intro n.
  f_equal.
  apply filter_rel_extensionality.
  intro m.
  destruct (deserialize_top deserialize m) eqn: Hm.
  + f_equal.
     apply pt_map_msg_extensionality.
  + reflexivity.
- apply functional_extensionality.
  intro n.
  destruct (odnwState net (tot_map_name_inv n)) eqn: Hn.
  + f_equal.
     apply pt_map_data_extensionality.
  + reflexivity.
Qed.

original: intros net. unfold pt_map_odnet, deserialize_odnet. f_equal. - apply functional_extensionality. intro n. f_equal. apply filter_rel_extensionality. intro m. destruct (deserialize_top deserialize m) eqn: Hm. + f_equal. apply pt_map_msg_extensionality. + reflexivity. - apply functional_extensionality. intro n. destruct (odnwState net (tot_map_name_inv n)) eqn: Hn. + f_equal. apply pt_map_data_extensionality. + reflexivity.
